item.description:
Dear Fellow Atheists,

Welcome to another blasphemous brunch with the Boston Atheists. Gather, ponder, argue, discuss, and warm up with good food and the gregarious company of your friendly neighborhood Atheists! The new, the old and the curious all welcome and encouraged! See you next Sunday :).

_ _

Â 

For this month's charitable giving, we'll be passing the hat for cash donations to be sent to the New England Center for Homeless Veterans. The Boston Atheists have inquired about serving as meal service volunteers at their facility in Government Center; keep your eyes open for the opportunity to participate.
item.name: Blasphemy Brunch!
